mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASES_TB ( PURCHASE_NO, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_SELLER, PRODUCT_NAME, PURCHASE_PRICE, PURCHASE_SH_FEE, PURCHASE_WAY, BUYER_NO, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_PHONE, BUYER_EMAIL, BUYER_ZIPCODE, BUYER_ADDRESS ) VALUES ( PURCHASE_NO_seq.nextval, ORDER_NO_seq.nextval, #{productNo}, #{productSeller}, #{productName}, #{purchasePrice}, #{purchaseShFee}, #{purchaseWay}, #{buyerNo}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerPhone}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerZipcode}, #{buyerAddress} )
